app_name: Groups Treatment Groups Apple Translate Travel Phrasebook Translator
app_description: The Travel Phrasebook App has many useful foreign phrases and words e.g. Thank you! How much or A table for two please! . When you tap a phrase the app speaks it aloud. There is no guessing as to how to pronounce the words. And if the app is talking too quickly for you simply tap the snail turtle icon to hear the words more slowly. Listen to pronunciation recorded by native speaker and then record and play back your own voice to practice your foreign language speaking skills! When traveling to foreign countries make sure you bring the app with you! Ideally you listen to a phrase and repeat it but if your accent is terrible you can play the voice on the app to local people e.g. a waiter or store clerk . Language barrier while travelling abroad will no longer exist! FEATURES 1. Many useful foreign phrases words 2. Pronunciation recorded by native speaker 3. Voice recording playback 4. No Internet connection required 5. Instant search by keywords 6. Customizable font size Welcome to download the Travel Phrasebook app! Easily learn foreign language phrases words including English French Spanish German Italian Dutch Chinese Japanese Korean Russian Turkish Portuguese Greek Arabic Vietnamese Thai Indonesian and Hindi!
